tool_description: Bulkus is email verification service: check if an email address is valid, really exists and can accept mails, plus a lot more!
name: Bulkus (email verification service)
title: Bulkus (email verification service)

api_list.name: api_key_check_handler
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bulkus-email-verification-service.p.rapidapi.com/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bulkus-email-verification-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
